title: Second Chance
description:
The new single from Digitalism, ’Second Chance,’ receives an exclusive North America early release to support the launch of the bands 2014 Live show. Do not be fooled, this release will be a remarkable one, not least because it features Vocals from Jence, the first such single since ‘Circles’ in 2011 on Pryda/V2/Downtown. 

In fact ’Second Chance’ comes off sounding like the perfect mix of Digitalism’s classic sound and the direction introduced at the start of 2014. It seems fitting that Digitalism release such a track at the end of a year that divided opinion on their new direction, whilst being one of their most successful periods at radio. 

The lyrical content of ’Second Chance’ are that of a bitter-sweet lament detailing lost love and second chances taking the listener on as many ‘lows’ as it will take ‘highs.’ Prepare for a musical and physical journey with the release of ’Second Chance’ and the 2014 live tour, both exclusive to the US in October and November 2014.

’Second Chance’ will be released on 21st October 2014
Digitalism will open the North America tour at The Hoxton in Toronto 23rd October 2014.

Follow Digitalism

http://www.twitter.com/digitalismMusic
http://www.facebook.com/digitalism
http://www.soundcloud.com/digitalism_...
http://www.instagram.com/digitalismof...
http://www.myspace.com/digitalism
http://www.thedigitalism.com/

title: W&W - Bigfoot (GirlsLoveDJs & Praia Del Sol Remix) [OUT NOW!]
description:
Exclusively available on Beatport: bit.ly/BigfootRMX_BP

To expand W&W’s massive ‘Bigfoot’ into new territories, an all-star remix cast took over the tune!
Dillon Francis chopped and screwed things into a sick trap mix, while GirlsLoveDJs brought the original into deep house territory together with Praia Del Sol. Last in line are the hardstyle boys LNY TNZ, who cranked up the BPMs for the peak hour party sets. Thanks to this remix package, you can now spot ‘Bigfoot’ everywhere!

tag_list: "sneaky sound system" "dave edwards" remix "the one" house electro summer
title: The Knocks feat. Sneaky Sound System - The One (Dave Edwards Remix)
description:
**Please show the track some love on HypeM!  http://hypem.com/track/252zf **

WAV and MP3 both available for free from my Facebook (link above ^)

Where to start with this one...this is the fourth remix I've done for The Knocks, and I think its safe to say after this there's something awesome going on when we do something together.  Not that they need any introduction at this point but The Knocks are a duo from NYC who consistently put out incredible tunes and although we make very different kinds of music I think we're both inspired by a lot of the same things.  Sneaky Sound System always manages to deliver epic vocals that lend themselves very well to being remixed, and when I first heard "The One" I got inspired pretty much instantly.  As I often do with my remixes, I decided to take the track from a more serious and minor-key tone into a uplifting major progression, and this remix combines a lot of my current influences into a track that has a lot of different sounds all working as one (and no I did not mean to create a horrible pun there).  This remix was an insane amount of work, my Ableton session was around 250 tracks for this one, but it was worth it - this is by far my favorite track I've done to date and something I hope you guys will be listening to for a long time to come.  

BOOKINGS, PRESS & REMIX INQUIRIES - 
ITSDAVEEDWARDS@GMAIL.COM

DAVE EDWARDS ON THE INTERWEBS -
LIKE my Facebook @ facebook.com/itsdaveedwards
FOLLOW my Twitter @ twitter.com/itsdaveedwards
HEART my Selfies @ instagram.com/daveedwards

SUPPORT THE KNOCKS & SNEAKY SOUND SYSTEM -
facebook.com/theknocksnyc
soundcloud.com/theknocks
twitter.com/theknocks

facebook.com/sneakysoundsystem
soundcloud.com/sneakysoundsystem
twitter.com/snkysndsystm

title: ASTR - Operate
description:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/operate/id794865886?i=794865941

 "..Debut single "Operate" pops into the tape deck and immediately whirrs to life, channeling the nostalgic drama of Miami Vice and classic horror film scores through gorgeous R&B-tinged vocals and temperamental hip-hop snares. It's every bit as cinematic as you'd expect, a smooth operator in the cool of night that makes for a promising debut from the NYC duo" -Neon Gold

http://neongoldrecords.blogspot.com/

ThankYou Neon Gold for your support.  We are so happy to have you guys a part of this release  and helping to get this song launched! -ASTR

title: Poolside - Harvest Moon
description:
This is a Neil Young cover. We wanted to give out some new music while we are finishing up our album. We thought a cover would be a good idea and since we both love Harvest Moon we decided to give it a try. It's super intimidating to cover Neil Young so we tried to make it a lot different, just so we didn't have to "compete" with the master.
Thanks to Coco Morier for the beautiful backing vocals and Dan "Cosmic Kids" Terndrup for his incredible finger snaps!

tag_list: moguai champs original size house techno remix club
title: Moguai - Champs (Full mix)
Jasper Byrne - Miami
description:
Prolific developer Jonatan Söderström and graphic artist Dennis Wedin have announced their newest game collaboration Hotline Miami will be released under their new joint label Dennaton Games and published by shady game cartel Devolver Digital.

Step into the neon-soaked underground of 1980s Miami as bizarre messages on your answering machine seem to be urging you to commit terrible acts of violence -- but will you obey? Hotline Miami overflows with raw brutality and skull crushing close combat as you find yourself outgunned and using your wits to choreograph your way through impossible situations. An unmistakable visual style, a driving soundtrack, and a surreal plot that will have you question your own thirst for blood. Bash and blast through over 20 multiscreen levels with 35 unique weapons and collect 25 game-altering masks in one of the darkest and most unusual independent games on the scene.

The hotline itself can be reached at +1 786 519 3708 or @HotlineMiami. Leave a message.

http://www.HotlineMiami.com/
http://www.Dennaton.com/
http://www.DevolverDigital.com/

tag_list: Martin Garrix animals original mix spinnin records
title: Martin Garrix - Animals (Original Mix) OUT NOW!
description:
Join me on Facebook: facebook.com/MartinGarrix
Join me on Twitter: twitter.com/martingarrix
Join me G+ : bit.ly/MARTINGARRIXGPLUS

Martin Garrix - Animals
One of the most hyped and discussed teasers of May 2013 was the teaser for 'Animals'. No artist name was mentioned and from that moment on fans and bloggers alike went head to head in heated discussions on who the artist could possibly be... It turned out to be Dutch prodigy Martin Garrix, which was officially announced by Billboard Magazine. The DJ support is overwhelming and we're sure this track will do ultimate dance floor damage. Just wait for that drop and prepare to jump! 

David Guetta : 'Nice'
Hardwell : 'Full support'
Afrojack : 'Support'
Steve Aoki : 'HUGE'
Sander van Doorn : 'Full support'
Fedde Le Grand : 'Played in my radioshow!'
Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike : 'It's fat!'
Chuckie : 'Sick tune!'
Porter Robinson : 'too good!'
Tommy Trash : 'fun'
Thomas Gold : 'Great one'
Danny Howard / BBC Radio 1 : 'Amazing!'
